1101100110000001 1111111100110000 1 -> sum: 1101100010110010, cout: 1
0101010000001011 0000001101011011 0 -> sum: 0101011101100110, cout: 0
1101000110010000 0100011001111100 0 -> sum: 0001100000001100, cout: 1
1001110000010010 0101010000010101 0 -> sum: 1111000000100111, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
